original: intros g f x H1 H2 H3. destruct H1 as [l1 H1]. destruct H2 as [l2 H2]. destruct H3 as [H31 | [M H32] | [M H33]]. - unfold ex_lim in H1. destruct H1 as [l H1]. exists l. apply is_lim_comp with (l:=l2). + apply Lim_correct. exists l2. apply H2. + apply H1. + intros y Hy. apply H31. apply Rbar_locally'P2 with (M:=1). * apply H2. * unfold Rbar_locally; simpl. exists 1. intros z Hz. apply Hz. - exists l2. apply is_lim_ext with (f:=g) (x:=x) in H2. + apply is_lim_comp with (l:=l2). * apply Lim_correct. exists l2. apply H2. * apply H1. * apply H33. + intros y. apply H32. - exists l2. apply is_lim_ext with (f:=g) (x:=x) in H2. + apply is_lim_comp with (l:=l2). * apply Lim_correct. exists l2. apply H2. * apply H1. * apply H33. + intros y. apply H32.
